overview: SIX: The Musical  has announced that the original cast of its West End production will reprise their roles at the Vaudeville Theatre for a live filming.  Henry the 8th wives can back to life and start a band however they argue about who will become  the lead singer. The musical is a modern retelling of the lives of the six wives of Henry VIII presented as a pop concert, as the Queens take turns singing and telling their story to see who suffered the most due to Henry.
title: SIX the Musical
